body.text: To make designing a card easier, there is a very handy [Card Designer](https://developer.webex.com/buttons-and-cards-designer) tool on the Webex for Developer portal that provides a drag & drop interface to build a card. It also automatically generates the JSON object for the card, making it a snap to implement it inside your app.
When your card is looking good in the designer, click the `Copy card JSON` button so you can move your design to your application and start building out the code to send it to Webex Teams.
